caption: This classical song is played on a harpsichord. This is music for royalty or aristocrats. There are some pedal notes played on the bass part and the main melody is played on the treble part. There are no other instruments in this song. There is no percussion in this song. There are no voices in this song. This song can be played in a movie scene where a king is entering his castle.
